Aegis.card_desc: [Shield] Your Shield has an infinite Duration and the Cooldown is reduced to 12s.

Brand.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting enemies with Fireball heals you for {scale=100|100} Health

Cavalier.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Dire Need.card_desc: [Shield] Gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed while using Shield.

Fearless Leader.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%

Formidable.card_desc: [Armor] Regenerate 55% of your maximum Health over 3s when you fall below 40% of your maximum Health.

Heat Transfer.card_desc: [Shield] Every 1000 Damage your shield takes reduces the cooldown of Charge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Hot Pursuit.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting Fireball increases your movement speed by {scale=8|8}% for 3s.

Immovable Object.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Incinerate.card_desc: [Fireball] Reduce the cooldown of Fireball by {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Last Stand.card_desc: [Shield] While Shield is active and you are below 40% Health, you heal {scale=100|100} Health each second until you reach 40% Health.

Launch.card_desc: [Charge] Increase the distance of Charge by {scale=12|12}%

Looks That Kill.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting an enemy with Fireball recharges {scale=20|20} ammo.

Pyre.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your maximum ammo capacity by {scale=10|10}.

Running Start.card_desc: [Charge] Gain {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s after using Charge.

Safe Travel.card_desc: [Charge] Gain a {scale=150|150} damage Shield for 3s after you Charge.

Scorch.card_desc: [Fireball] Fireball deals 45% more damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.

Towering Barrier.card_desc: [Shield] Increase the Health of Shield by {scale=500|500}.
